projects.title: Microsoft Azure : Face ID
projects.description: Microsoft Azure: Cognitive Service, Face Recognition with the Face API refers to using Microsoft Azure's cognitive services, specifically the Face API, for recognizing faces. Simply put, it's about using technology to identify and recognize faces in images or videos. This can be used in various areas like security, identity management, personalized user experiences, and more.

projects.title: Twitter with NodeJS
projects.description: Building a Twitter in Node.js refers to creating a social media platform similar to Twitter using the Node.js programming language. It involves developing features like posting tweets, following other users, liking tweets, and engaging in conversations.
